item.title: Personal Website Workshop
item.description: Getting Started Install Code Editor: VScode Install Package Manager: Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Install Static Site Generator Hugo brew install hugo Follow the directions on the terminal output Create your Website Create Hugo Project hugo new site quickstart -f yml Install Theme cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod.git themes/PaperMod Open the project in VSCode open . This will open the current folder in finder Right click on config.
